document_data.mainbody:
Graddis was a werebear inhabiting Zhentil Keeps Foreign Quarter during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Graddis lived and worked with Tymoras Holy Hall of Good Fortune and Casino. He patrolled the halls of the temple, monitoring the gamblers for any signs of trouble. Graddis would change into a fearsome bear and approach troublemakers, grabbing minor offenders with his paws and hurling them outside. Serious threats were attacked with vigor and Graddis was usually aided by Tymoras clerics.
